2024-02-01-visualization
In this seminar, we discuss ideas for teaching good data visualization, including grammar of graphics, Gestalt principles and preattentive attributes, and elemental groupings.

title: About CATS
text: Conversations About Teaching Statistics is a casual monthly seminar discussion held by the Cal Poly Statistics Department. In this blog, we convert our short presentations and ideas into bite-sized posts to share with you!
